ProductCategoryDataTranslation.name: ProductCategoryDataTranslation
ProductCategoryDataTranslation.description: Represents the translated values for the data stored within a ProductCategory recordâ€™s fields.

Description.description: The translated value for the Product Category description.

IsOutOfDate.description: Indicates whether the translation is out-of-date (true) or current (false). A translation is out-of-date if the parent ProductCategory record is updated after the last translation was filed.

Language.description: The language for these translated values.

Name.description: The translated value for the Product Category name.

ParentId.description: The ID of the category being translated.
